question: Hi i am new here anyone please help.my fathers age is 52. He is having high blood pressure since 12 years and it always will be around 160/100 and diabetes from 10 years. Sugar levels will also be around 250 fasting. His tryglycerides are around 200 and overall cholestrol is 200 hdl is 35-36. Ldl is 50. His first ecg showed poor r wave progression last year. And the next one showed flat t wave abnormality and recent one showed borderline ecg. Does this mean he had a heart attack without symptoms? And can it be considered as CAD? Please help me i am worried.
title: fathers health
